Class MapModel

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.map.MapModel
public class MapModel extends Object
The map model is a collection of LayerStates and the current extent of the map.
Author:
Douglas Lau

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected final Point2D
    center
    Current center in user coordinates

    extent

    protected final LinkedList<LayerState>
    lstates
    List of all layers
    protected ZoomLevel
    zoom
    Current zoom level

      public void setExtent(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Set the bounding box for display
      Parameters:
      x - the new x-coordinate for the map.
      y - the new y-coordinate for the map.
      width - the new width for the map.
      height - the new height for the map.
